query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Campus partnerships
result.description: Viable partnerships, transdisciplinary locally, nationally and internationally, where the boundaries between producers (HEIs) and users (non-academic stakeholders) of knowledge are disappearing, HEIs’ teachers, RDI staff, students and practitioners jointly work for solutions. English for general meeting and local/regional implementation in Finnish, Portuguese, Spanish, , Romanian, German and Czech as well
